name: Wild Campers
description:
This is free early access.

Wild Campers is a hero defence survival game, in which You play as a man who went camping in the woods. Suddenly animals gone mad and you are supposed to defend tour tent. You need to gather resources in order to craft weapons, patch up your tent, and survive. Game also contains a tasks and a story of a yet two chapters.

The project took me long time already, please consider donation in order to encourage me to finish this game :)
